          +these old sessions will appear as
          +orphaned tmux sessions (not recognized by
          + `ib list`). Clean them up manually with
          +`tmux kill-session -t <session-name>` or
          +`tmux kill-server` if no other tmux
          +sessions are in use.
      271 +
      272   ### Process Hierarchy
      273
      274   ```

⏺ Bash(git add -A && git commit -m "Add migration note for
      existing sessions in CLAUDE.md…)
  ⎿ [agent/multi-repo-ib eb96cc0] Add migration note fo
    r existing sessions in CLAUDE.md
     1 file changed, 2 insertions(+)


⏺ To summarize:

  1. openssl fallback: Not needed - openssl is already a har
d dependency used for agent ID generation at lines 2490 and
8754. If it's missing, ib new-agent fails anyway.
  2. Existing sessions migration: Added a migration note to
CLAUDE.md explaining that old-format sessions (ittybitty-<ag
ent-id>) will appear orphaned after upgrading and how to cle
an them up manually.

  I HAVE COMPLETED THE GOAL

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
❯ ib merge multi-repo-ib --force                     ↵ send
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
  repo | Opus 4.5
  agent/multi-repo-ib
  Session: 27% (1h 14m) Weekly: 24% (5d 5h)
  ⏵⏵ accept edits on (shift+tab to cycle)
